argument.description: Is the string expression to be searched. string_expression can be of a character or binary data type.

Is the substring to be found. string_pattern can be of a character or binary data type. string_pattern cannot be an empty string (''), and must not exceed the maximum number of bytes that fits on a page.
Is the replacement string. string_replacement can be of a character or binary data type.

returnType: Returns nvarchar if one of the input arguments is of the nvarchar data type; otherwise, REPLACE returns varchar.
description: Replaces all occurrences of a specified string value with another string value.
